instructions: In a web browser on your desktop or laptop computer, open the Google Assistant Ring services web page . At the top of the page, select Send to device . In the drop-down menu, choose the Google Home device you want to connect to the Ring. On your phone, you should get a notification stating you need to link Google to your Ring account. Tap the notification, and complete the process by entering your Ring username and password in the authorization form. Your setup process is complete you can now access Ring from Google Home.
